description: Classifier implementing the k-nearest neigbors vote.

param.description: Number of neighbors to use by default for kneighbors queries.
param.name: n_neigbors
algorithm
param.description: Algorithm to use to compute nearest neigbors.

param.name: p
param.description: Power parameter for the Minkowski metric. When p = 1, this is equivalent to using manhattan_distance (l1), and euclidean_distance (l2) for p = 2. For arbitrary p, minkowski_distance (l_p) is used.
